issue.title: [C++] ABORT_NOT_OK evalutes expression twice
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5160](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5160). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ABORT_NOT_OK in gtest_util.h evaluates the expression twice due to a typo.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5160?focusedCommentId=16815153) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4139
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4139>
